document.full_text: heart devices known as drug-eluting stents have added as much as $1.57 billion to u.s. health costs since their introduction in 2003, u.s. researchers said on monday.
document.title: stents: how new technology drives health costs
lines_and_colors: heart devices known as drug-eluting stents have added as much as $1.57 billion to u.s. health costs since their introduction in 2003, u.s. researchers said on monday.
